turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I need to order some coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. What kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Today I've got something special in mind. I'd like the Caramel Brulée Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Tall, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: soy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, of course.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so i have a a tall caramel brule latte with soy milk and whipped cream, is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. Where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to eat at the Starbucks on McKinney in Dallas, Texas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks mckinney.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. Your receipt will be sent to you via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: byebye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Goodbye.
